paymentprovider

Interface IPayment

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BankCardProvider, CreditCardProvider, PaymentProvider

    public interface IPayment
    Specifies the behavior that is associated with making payments.
    Author:
    OOP

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PaymentTransaction pay(float price)
      Allows to make a payment for the given price.

    • Method Detail

      • pay

        PaymentTransaction pay(float price)
        Allows to make a payment for the given price. A corresponding PaymentTransaction is returned after the payment has been made. The result of this method may be NULL if the payment could not be made.
        Parameters:
        price - The price that should be paid
        Returns:
        a PaymentTransaction for the given price
